definition: can talk really well (idiom); the gift of the gab
can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: Zhouxiangdong passed, will engage in a very personal.
sentences.chinese: 周向东能说会道，很会搞人际关系。

sentences.english: For the child glib, quail was married parrot.
sentences.chinese: 为了孩子能说会道，鹌鹑嫁给了鹦鹉。

sentences.english: I do not know about his being humane, but what does he need eloquence for?
sentences.chinese: 他有没有仁德，我不清楚，但何必要能说会道呢？

definition: eloquent and fluent speaker (idiom); grandiloquence/the gift of the gab
be smooth and slick (in establishing social relations)
clever and eloquent (idiom); fluent/having the gift of the gab
lit. to have a tongue like a reed (idiom)/fig. to have a glib tongue
(fig.) adaptable/able to deal with various kinds of people and situations/(derog.) insincere/two-faced
